ygData.subject: Re: SPells
ygData.msgSnippet: I would recommend getting Gate and holy armor.  Gate lets you go to your bind point from anywhere in Norrath.  Holy armor adds 6 AC (I think) and that really
ygData.messageBody:
I would recommend getting Gate and holy armor. Gate lets you go to your
bind point from anywhere in Norrath. Holy armor adds 6 AC (I think) and
that really helps a lot at your level.
Your wep is fine.. get someone to tarnish it and then just sit tight til
level 9 when you get hammer of wrath.
Allsar Olath`Vlos
